about_the_game:
Game Description:

This is a horror game. You wake up from a room and see a letter written by Lily. The content of the letter tells the story of Lily's work. Because Lily changed the patient's medicine by mistake, the patient's condition became more serious, so Lily was expelled from the hospital. Lily changed her new job and then went to a nursing home, but who knows that there are even more bizarre things here. Lily became more and more wrong to write to you, but she was finally caught by the dean!

Lily had no choice but to send you the last letter for help. After you received it, you went to the nursing home to save Lily! You need to manipulate the protagonist to explore the key in the nursing home, step by step until you open the basement door and go to Lily's trapped room to save her, but you should always be alert to the terrible monsters hiding in the nursing home!

Game Operations

Move: WASD, Observe: Mouse, Flashlight: If you have a battery, press F to turn on and off the flashlight, Hide: If you are hunted by a terrible monster you can press Ctrl to crouch under the table,

Interaction: There are some items in the game that can be interacted with, you can press E to interact, Inhibitor: If you have an inhibitor, you can press the left mouse button to eject,

Monsters: Monsters patrol around every corner, keep an eye out for your room door closed! Monsters have keen vision, and if they are targeted, they will go out of their way to hunt you down!

Game Story:

In the beautiful morning, you receive a letter from Lily, who tells you that she has changed jobs and works as a doctor on call at a psychiatric nursing home.

And tells you to wait for her to come back, but the good times don't last long, and as she works in the nursing home for more and more time, Lily discovers something strange.

The patient would make strange noises at night, and Lily initially thought that the patient was using the wrong medicine, until she saw the dean's strange behavior.

Unexpectedly, Lily is discovered and imprisoned by the dean, and Lily does everything she can to send you one last letter...

Psychiatric Sanatorium:

You bravely enter the spiritual sanatorium, a place full of horrors and unknowns. The gloomy and terrifying atmosphere of the madhouse symbolizes the fear and madness that lies deep within the human heart!

Dean's Experiment:

The Dean's human experiments symbolize interference and desecration of order, reflecting the human desire for power and control, as well as the boundaries of scientific ethics.

Variation:

Tom's mutation is not only an outward physical change, but also a profound transformation of his inner world, from an ordinary person to an existence with supernatural powers.

Inner Storm:

The storm symbolizes the wild forces of nature, as well as the turmoil of the protagonist's inner world. The appearance of the storm coincides with the moment of Tom's physical mutation, symbolizing a drastic change in his identity and fate. In the midst of the storm, Tom begins to feel the mutation of his body, and this fear and uncertainty about his identity and future further exacerbates his inner storm. Not only does he have to face the pain of losing his lover, but he also has to face the fear that he could turn into a monster.
